title: @konemono Nostr Web Components
description: A component library for easily integrating Nostr protocol into your web applications

note.description: Display Nostr notes with complete functionality including post details, reactions, and replies.

profile.description: Display user profiles with options for full profile or name-only display modes.

list.description: Display lists of Nostr events based on filter criteria with customizable limit settings.

naddr.description: Display content from Nostr addresses (naddr). Supports long-form articles and profile information.

demo.title: Demo
demo.description: Below are live examples of the components in action. See how each component functions in real-time.
